text: Hello Issac, pre loading an image is a valid use case for this hook, although you shouldn’t need to swap the domain client side like this. Can you share the full asset url prior to your domain swap? Feel free to DM me the URL as well, if you’d prefer that.
Hi, what’s the best approach for a multi-language React module to translate generic text (like pagination buttons for Previous/Next)?
The issue from last week with module searching should be fixed. (Ie should still be working) let us know if you run into any issues.
Ok, will do. Haven’t started yet but working on that project again today
TLDR for those who are catching up — Issue was not related to the CLI but was related to a bug in the migration from our old module searching in the sidebar to a new elastic search in the sidebar.
